en_description: One point for each green touching the edge of the map.
One point for each green surrounded on all four sides (or map edge).
Three points for each mountain space connected to another mountain via a chain of greens.
One point for each row and column with at least one green. The same green can count for both row+column.
Two points for each blue adjacent to a mountain. One point for each yellow adjacent to a mountain.
Three points for each individual blue/yellow cluster, but no points if it touches the map edge or the opposite color.
One point for each blue adjacent to a ruins spaces. Three points for each yellow on a ruins space.
One point for each blue adjacent to at least one yellow and each yellow adjacent to at least one blue.
Eight points for each cluster of reds that is at least 6 spaces.
One point for each red space in the largest cluster of reds that is not touching a mountain.
Two points for each space in the second largest cluster of reds.
Three points for each cluster of reds that is adjacent to at least 3 different other terrain types.
Three points for each complete diagonal line of filled spaces that touches the left and bottom edges of map.
One point for each empty square surrounded on all four sides (or map edge).
Six points for each complete row and column.
Three points for each space along one edge of the largest square of filled spaces. (2 x 2 square = 2*3 points)
Earn two points for each green in the longest unbroken column of greens.
Earn six points for each cluster of five or more greens that is not adjacent to any reds.
Earn two points for each green surrounded on all four sides by greens or the edge of the map.
Earn four points for each row that contains three or more greens.
Earn seven points for each cluster of yellows adjacent to three or more blues.
Earn four points for each blue adjacent to two or more yellows.
Earn five points for each mountain space connected to a yellow by a cluster of blues.
Earn four points for each column that contains an equal number of yellows and blues. There must be at least one of each.
Earn seven points for each cluster of reds that contains four spaces in a 4x1 or 1x4 rectangle.
Choose a cluster of reds and earn one reputation point for each empty space adjacent to that cluster.
Earn six points for each cluster of reds that contains four spaces in a 2x2 square.
Choose a cluster of reds and earn one reputation point for each row and column that contains a space from that cluster.
Earn seven points for each complete row or complete column of filled spaces that contains a mountain space.
Earn ten points for each complete odd numbered column of filled spaces.
Earn four points for each row that contains five or more different terrain types.
Earn four points for each cluster of exactly three empty spaces surrounded on all sides by filled spaces or the edge of the map.
Earn five points for each mountain connected to a ruin space by filled spaces of the same colour. The ruin space must have the same colour.
Earn eight points for a complete row or column blow ground.
Earn five points for each different colour in lowest row of the map.
